item.description: Message tagger will basically run a pipeline on conversational chatter that comes in from platforms like Slack, Teams. It will provide features like,
Topic Why am I learning this? Referenced Content NLP Feature Extraction Need to learn feature extraction because I am building
#WIP I have this wild idea, which I sleep on every night. What if the governance flows from bottom to top?

item.title: Building in Public 📢
item.description: [[Open Sourcing Governance|Open Sourcing Governance]] A medium for dialogue and reform in India. Building India and world step by step.

item.title: Conversation Copilot
item.description: Never miss out on another conversations. Get actionable insights on top of conversations. Native integration with Slack.

item.title: Favourite Podcasts & Talks 🎧
item.description: How to raise money? #startup #funding - Jeff Epstein Cuts the slack and directly talks about how to go about raising money when you are going into the startup journey.

item.title: Favourite Podcasts 📢
item.description: Computer Sciency 👾 Me likey, a lot of amaze people coming as guest on the show, Sanity 🧘‍♀️ Tired of the hustle bustle?

item.title: Music 🎧
item.description: I listen to music day in and out. Anthems The music that I start my day with. Story behind each song in the playlist Harder, Better, Faster, Stronger -Daft Punk

item.title: My Subscriptions
item.description: 1Password Worth it? Oh yes! If you use the same password everywhere, let me tell you my friend, it is quite easy to hack your account.

item.title: Training my first AI Model 🤖
item.description: Let me take you on a journey through training of an AI model. Problem Statement I am building [[Conversation Copilot]], one of the features I am targeting in v1 is tracking of followup on a message.

item.title: Trips 🛫
item.description: United Kingdom June 18th to July 9th 2023 Went around Edinburgh, Highlands of Scotland and London.

item.title: Words of wisdom 😇
item.description: September 4th 2023 #mindfulness #love Attention is the most basic form of love. Tara Brach July 26th 2023 #work #love

item.title: ⏸️ Currently Playing ▶️
item.description: Talk Link Listened On Tags What did I learn? Social Links Health & Longevity - Behind paywall [[My Subscriptions#Waking Up]] 17th August 2023 #health #meditation #exercise Talks at length about how to have great health, with increased life span.
